source_objects.title: Influence
source_objects.description: From negotiation tactics to communication strategies, winning friends to persuading colleagues, learn how to most effectively make an impact with these courses on influence.

items.title: Using Emotional Intelligence on the Job
items.headline: Understand how to communicate with empathy and apply emotional intelligence skills in your profession.
objectives_summary: understand the impact of workplace emotions
know how to communicate with empathy
apply emotional intelligence in a confrontation

items.title: Practical Voice Training: The Complete Package
items.headline: Master your voice, build your presence and engage people when you speak
objectives_summary: Be more engaging when you speak, drawing people in to listen to you
Speak with a clearer, stronger voice
Unlock the natural potential of your own voice and your vocal influence

items.title: Communication Skills: Be a Star Presenter on a Panels
items.headline: Communication Skills - How to convey confidence and be memorable. You can be the star of every panel.
objectives_summary: Present effectively on a Panel Group
Speak equally well sitting or standing
Rehearse effectively for panel presenations

items.title: Black Belt Communication: Verbal Skills for a Bolder New You
items.headline: High-Impact Strategies. Unique Breakthrough Exercises. Confidence-packed Content. Learn to Get What you Want, Easier.
objectives_summary: Communicate with confidence
Easily handle criticism and feedback
Influence others and manage yourself better

items.title: Influencing Without Authority Using Emotional Intelligence

visible_instructors.title: Rocco Dal Vera
visible_instructors.name: Rocco
visible_instructors.job_title: Author, Professor, Facilitator, Vocal Coach, Consultant

items.headline: Learn tangible skills to connect, engage and influence at a deeper level to become a more effective manager and leader.
objectives_summary: Influencing Without Authority will teach you how to engage others, manage interactions and best of all, shape outcomes enabling you to become a more effective manager and leader.
Effectively establish rapport with anyone over the phone or in person using vocal mirroring techniques
Quickly establish rapport with anyone even if you don't feel like it.

items.title: Life Hack With Color Psychology: Increase Your Influence
items.headline: Become a powerful visual communicator and more effectively sell your ideas, your message, and your products or services.
objectives_summary: Increase your impact significantly in less than 2 hours
Create mood and convey your message better in all your visual communications and presentations.
Make more informed decisions about choosing colors to sell your idea, message, or brand.

items.title: Body Language: Appear Confident and Poised When You Speak
items.headline: Body Language for Speakers: Learn how to look comfortable, confident and relaxed in any presentation opportunity.
objectives_summary: Looking comfortable when speaking
Not feeling anxious while speaking
Knowing how to move your hands, feet and body in a presentation

items.title: How to have a positive impact on people
items.headline: Making a difference
objectives_summary: You will learn about the importance of influencing skills
You will learn about steps that can be taken to make a good impression
You will be introduced to a range of practical tools for making a positive impact

items.title: Public Speaking Complete Presentation Skills Masterclass A-Z
items.headline: Learn the public speaking and Presentation Skills to giving a master presentation 2020 | Step by Step
objectives_summary: Look comfortable, confident and relaxed in any speaking situation
Speak in a clear and understandable manner
How to quickly identify the goals of your audience without them knowing you did it

items.title: The Power and Principles of Persuasion
items.headline: A fool will attempt to manipulate me with his ideas, while a wise man will persuades me with my own.
objectives_summary: Know why plants are often more persuasive than people
Spot the ten worst and most popular methods of persuasion
Recognize the motivations most humans have in common

items.title: An In-Depth Approach to Debate and Critical Discussion
items.headline: We give you pure, zero-fluff content. Learn the stragegies and skills of effective debate and discussion.
objectives_summary: FREE Live Practice! (More Information Above and In Video Below!)
Command the attention in a room (online or off)
Better articulate your thoughts

items.title: Essential influencing skills for the workplace
items.headline: Achieve your goals and aspirations through influencing others. Increase effectiveness as a leader and a team worker
objectives_summary: Explain the Assertive Persuasion influencing style
Use the Assertive Persuasion influencing style
Assess when the Assertive Persuasion influencing style is both most, and least, likely to be effective

items.title: Getting Results by Building Relationships
items.headline: Learn how to thrive in the corporate world when you have no formal authority
objectives_summary: Set a foundation for getting professional results, improve your skills in making a good first impression and build a rapport with your co-workers.
Build credibility for the purpose of getting results, win the confidence of your co-workers
Apply the steps for dealing with conflict in a real life scenario.

items.title: Elite Communication Skills to get What you Want with Words

visible_instructors.title: Andrew PM Tse
visible_instructors.name: Andrew PM
visible_instructors.job_title: A Centurion of teaching entrepreneurship over academics.

items.headline: If you need to persuade or feel more comfortable in conversation - Enrol in this Course for more effective communicating
objectives_summary: Drastically improve your ability to communicate concisely and influence others
Top techniques and psychology hacks to make sure people listen to you and remember you.
Be more interesting and engaging to the people you meet

items.title: Calm Angry People Quickly

visible_instructors.title: Dr. Richard Walters
visible_instructors.name: Dr. Richard
visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Psychologist and Human Relations Specialist

items.headline: ... gain peace and productivity.
objectives_summary: To be confident when dealing with an angry person.
To show that you will listen without judgment to their grievances.

Example: Angry person screams, "No one ever listens to me!"  You reply, in a smooth and respectful voice, "That must be hard to put up with, so I would like to listen right now to  whatever you want to say."

items.title: Persuasion in Business Communications
items.headline: The Complete Lunchtime Persuasion in Business Communications Course
objectives_summary: Give persuasive talks, briefings, speeches and presentations
Influence colleagues, bosses, prospects and clients
Get teams to take actions
